I was going to put a door handle on my teams robot cuz I thought it was funny but now some people claim it’s an illegal part. Idk where I would find out so someone please help it would be so funny to have a door handle

It could be illegal if:

  • the handle has electronic motors not listed under the legal motor list
  • addition of the handle puts the robot over the weight limit
  • the handle violates frame perimeter rules
  • the handle is radioactive, made of combustible materials, or is a living animal

I would like to clarify that no one claimed putting a door handle on the robot would be illegal, but instead suggested that you follow proper design procedures and consider the consequences of the design, including the proper mounting methods.

This reminds me of one time wayyyy before I was mentor to any of my pure little roboteers! Ahaha! I had my old 1982 Chevy s10 and it was rsuted just straight through~! I couldn’t close the door anymore!@
I got me one of my hill billy friends that could weld two tin cans together with his eyes closed and one arm behind his back. He also had a couple toes missing from a mistake at the range a few years berfore… but that’s not here nor there. But we needed to get my door to close and lock because I didn’t live in the safest area at the time and I needed a bit of extra security. Well, we couldn’t find another door at the local junk but we did have a door just sittin in that there burn pile.

My good old buudy done picked that door up and stole the handle and welded up a few plates and drilled a few holes and filed down some edges there and wouldn;t you know it? I had a good old house door knob on the s10 there. And let me tell you she woeked! for years! wow Imiss that old truck of mine.

Anyways I thought we were good an dandy until one day I got pulled over and the officer, bless her soul she was just doing her duty, but hse wrote me up a citation for that beautiful welding job that my hilly friend did for me. I guess all is fair and I should have known that it might not be legal. I paid my fine and my dues because I am a god fearing decent citisen.

But here’s the real kicker!! That door knob wasn’t illegal! I had been tricked!

Anyways, this has been fun to remember those times we had fixin my truck with my friend. I wish I could give him a call. He was a good man.

Thank you, this is indeed what happened. No one has an issue with the door knob itself, it was just a bit disconcerting to pull the robot out and find that someone had super glued a door knob to the robot, without having checked with any mentors or directors.
